channel.title: [562] tutorial for fixing 'yerfy and cj we run things' [562]
channel.description:
this my first help post. i now alot more but this important i think. here it comes. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ go to your server folder. go to data folder. go to scripts folder. open authention with notepad/wordpad. find yerfy and cj we run things. change it to your own server message when you log in. example: welcome back to (server name). ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ try out some colors to pimp. like this. <col=FF0000>welcome back to runescape <col=FF0000> is Red <img=1> is admin crown.
[b]More info needed about 562?[/b] add ferat_@live.nl

item.title: [562] tutorial for fixing 'yerfy and cj we run things' [562]
item.dc:creator: @gino_pieter_ferat gino pieter ferat
item.description:
@gino_pieter_ferat wrote:

this my first help post.
i now alot more but this important i think.
here it comes.

go to your server folder.
go to data folder.
go to scripts folder.
open authention with notepad/wordpad.
find yerfy and cj we run things.
change it to your own server message when you log in.
example: welcome back to (server name).

try out some colors to pimp.
like this.
<col=FF0000>welcome back to runescape
<col=FF0000> is Red
<img=1> is admin crown.

More info needed about 562?
add ferat_@live.nl

Read full topic
